Cloud Step: May Stride over insubstantial surfaces and traps
Implausible Infiltration: May use 2 actions to move through up to 10' of wood, plaster, or stone
Light Step: May move normally over difficult terrain

Vigilant Senses: Perception Master
Assurance (Folktale Lore): May take 10 on Folktale Lore rolls
Delay Trap: May attempt a +5 DC Thievery to delay or disable trap activation
Dubious Knowledge: Fail on Recall Knowledge yields a mix of true and false info
Expeditious Search: May Search at 4x normal speed
Quick Squeeze: May Squeeze 5'/rd (critical success 10'
Sabotage: May use Thievery to damage an item in a foe's hand
Sense The Unseen: May use a Reaction on a failed Seek to make undetected foes hidden
Sneak Savant: Normal failures on Sneak actions are successes
Subtle Theft: Successful Steal inflicts -2 Perception on observers to detect/May remain undetected after Palm an Object or Steal action after Create a Diversion
Trap Finder: +1 AC vs. traps
Combat
Hit Points: 268 Armor Class: 40 (dexterity (3 max); master) Class DC: Rogue: 41 (dexterity; master)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Fist (+31 1d4+4 B); Sickle (+31 1d4+4 S); Spiked Gauntlet (+30 1d4+4 P)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +5
Greater Weapon Specialization: Increased Weapon Specialization effects
Light Armor Expertise: Armor Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Light Armor Mastery: Armor Master (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Master Strike: Class Master (Rogue)
Master Tricks: Weapon Master (Simple Weapons; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Unarmed Attacks)
Multitalented: +1 Class Feat (multiclass dedication)
Rogue Expertise: Class Expert (Rogue)
Ruffian: Armor Trained (Medium Armor)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Toughness: +20 Hit Points
Unconventional Expertise: Weapon Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Unconventional Weaponry: Weapon Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons): Weapon Trained (Simple Weapons)
Weapon Tricks: Weapon Expert (Simple Weapons; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Unarmed Attacks)
Battle Assessment: May use Perception vs. Deception or Stealth DC to determine foe strengths and weaknesses
Blind-Fight: May attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 check/Does not suffer flat-footed with hidden foes
Brutal Beating: Critical success on a Strike inflicts frightened 1
Critical Debilitation: Debilitating Strike forces foe Fortitude saves; critical failure paralyzes for 1 rd; failure/success inflicts slowed 2/1 for 1 rd
Debilitating Strike: Successful Strike against a flat-footed foe inflicts choice of -10' Speed or enfeebled 1
Defensive Roll: May negate half damage from an attack that would reduce self to 0 Hit Points 1/10 min
Deny Advantage: Foes of equal or lower level cannot inflict flat-footed
Dispelling Slice: May use 2 actions to dispel a magical effect on target with a successful sneak attack
Distracting Feint: A successful Feint inflicts -2 Perception and Reflex saves
Double Debilitation: Debilitating Strike inflicts choice of two debilitations
Dread Striker: Frightened foes are flat-footed vs. self attacks
Fantastic Leap: May use 2 actions to Strike after a High Jump or Long Jump, using Long Jump distance for either
Felling Shot: May use 2 actions to force a Reflex save with a successful Strike vs. an airborne flat-footed foe; critical failure grounds for 1 rd; failure causes 120' fall
Gang Up: Threats from allies inflict flat-footed on foes vs. self attacks
Impossible Striker: May use sneak attack vs. non-flat-footed foe
Improved Poison Weapon: Poisoned weapons inflict +2d4 HP damage/Critical miss does not waste poison
Instant Opening: R30' May use a distraction to inflict flat-footed vs. self for 1 rd
Leave An Opening: A critical hit vs. a flat-footed foe gives an ally an Attack Of Opportunity
Master Strike: Successful Strikes on flat-footed foes force Fortitude saves; critical failure inflicts choice of paralyzed for 4 rd, knocked unconscious for 2 hours, or killed; failure inflicts paralyzed for 4 rd; success inflicts enfeebled 2 for 1 rd
Mobility: May Stride half Speed without triggering reactions
Nimble Dodge: May use a Reaction to gain +2 AC against 1 attacker
Opportune Backstab: May use a Reaction after an ally hits a foe to Strike the same foe
Poison Weapon: May apply poison to piercing and slashing weapons
Powerful Sneak: May change sneak attack damage to match weapon type
Precise Debilitations: Debilitating Strike may inflict +2d6 HP damage or flat-footed
Quick Draw: May use 1 action to draw a weapon and Strike
Reactive Distraction: May use a Reaction to redirect effect or attack from self to decoy
Reactive Interference: May use a Reaction to prevent foe Reaction; requires an attack against a higher-level foe
Reactive Pursuit: May use a Reaction to remain adjacent to a retreating foe
Ruffian: May sneak attack with any simple weapon/May apply critical specialization on a successful Strike with a d8 or lighter simple weapon on a flat-footed foe
Scoundrel: A successful Feint inflicts flat-footed on foe vs. self attacks (critical success all attacks) for 1 rd
Scout's Warning: May give allies +1 initiative
Sidestep: May use a Reaction to redirect a failed Strike on self to an adjacent creature
Skirmish Strike: May use 1 action to Step and Strike
Sly Striker: Successful Strikes with sneak attack weapons inflict +2d6 HP damage
Sneak Attack: +4d6 HP damage vs. flat-footed foe with agile, finesse, or ranged weapons
Spring From The Shadows: May Strike an unaware foe after a Stride
Surprise Attack: May use Deception or Stealth for initiative to inflict flat-footed on creatures that haven't acted
Tactical Debilitations: Debilitating Strike may prevent reactions or flanking
Thief: +1 HP damage with finesse melee weapons
Trap Finder: +1 Perception and automatic Search to find traps/May disable traps that require master in Thievery
Twin Feint: May use 2 actions to Strike with each hand, inflicting flat-footed on the second
Twist The Knife: Sneak attacks inflict 4 HP persistent bleed damage
Unbalancing Blow: Critical hits inflict flat-footed vs. self attacks for 1 rd
Vicious Debilitations: Debilitating Strike may inflict weakness 5 to choice of weapon type or clumsy 1
Weapon Specialization: +4/+6/+8 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Weapon Tricks: Critical hits vs. a flat-footed foe with unarmed attacks and agile, finesse, and rogue weapons inflict its critical specialization effect
You're Next: May use Reaction for a +2 Intimidation to Demoralize another foe after current foe drops
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +33 (dexterity; legendary); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Master (Will)
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Improved Evasion: Save Legendary (Reflex)
Slippery Mind: Save Master (Will)
Blank Slate: Immune to detection, revelation and scrying effects of less than 10 counteract level
Cognitive Loophole: May use a Reaction to suppress a mental effect for 1 rd
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. ongoing disease or poison reduces stage by 2 (1 if virulent; 3 or 2 with critical success)
Improved Evasion: Critical failures on Reflex saves are normal failures/Suffers half normal damage from failed Reflex saves
Nimble Roll: May use Nimble Dodge before a Reflex save; success allows a 10' Stride
Slippery Mind: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Trap Finder: +1 vs. traps
Magic
Magic Notes:
Hidden Paragon: May become invisible for 1 min 1/hour
Magical Trickster: Spell attacks vs. flat-footed foes inflict sneak attack damage
Minor Magic: Knows 2 cantrips from chosen tradition
Perfect Distraction: May use Mislead effects 1/10 min
Trickster's Ace: May use a Reaction to evoke effects of a prepared spell up to level 4

Validation Errors:
